flawed_nl_solution:
Bella eats during the week, 6 apples/day * 7 days/week = <<6*7=42>>42 apples/week
Grace harvests 42 apples/week * 3 = <<42*3=216>>216 apples during the week.
Leftover after Bella eats, 216 apples/week - 42 apples/week = <<216-42=174>>174 apples/week.
After 6 weeks Grace will have 174 apples/week * 6 weeks = <<174*6=1044>>1044 apples.
#### 1044

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 126, not 216. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
